      • startLimitedPushing

        public void startLimitedPushing(int interval,
                                int n)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: PushModeControllingI
        start n>/code> pushing of data and force the pushing to be done each interval period of time.

        Contract

         pre    interval > 0 && n > 0
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        startLimitedPushing in interface PushModeControllingI
        Parameters:
        interval - delay between pushes (in milliseconds).
        n - total number of pushes to be done, unless stopped.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
